titles: A poem on the most deplorable death of the Mighty Monarch, Charles II, King of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland
author: Loyal P. E. N.
Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.
notes: Signed at end: by a loyal P.E.N.

Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Charles --  II, --  King of England, 1630-1685 --  Poetry.
